title: Why TypeScript is the Better Choice over JavaScript
snippet: Understand why TypeScript is increasingly favored over JavaScript.
content:
TypeScript brings static typing to JavaScript. It helps reduce bugs and improve developer productivity. Hereâ€™s a simple comparison:

let message: string = 'Hello';
message = 5; // Error

This would not be caught in JavaScript, leading to possible runtime issues.

function add(a: number, b: number): number {
  return a + b;
}

With TypeScript, we can catch type mismatches during development. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium.
